website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a minimizer bra with plenty of compression, this one is an excellent choice. It's ideal for higher-impact activities.
pros: This minimizer sports bra is ideal for active women
The racer back style makes it a comfortable choice for higher-impact activities
cons: Women who dislike bras that squeeze the chest might not find this bra to be the most comfortable

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing. It's a compression style bra, and it reaaaaally holds the goods. I'm a 32GG UK sizing, and it's perfect. I mean, it is a *little* tight but that can be fixed with 2 pronged bra extenders. It actually covers everything, there's no weird muffin-boob or anything, the straps don't hurt. It's just a really good sports bra for big boobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great for large breasts
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best sports bras for large chests. I was able to run and complete crossfit workouts with only this bra on!!! Amazing! I usually wear 3 sports bras, so I was very happy with this one. The only thing I don't like is that it is kind of thin near the nipples and I don't like when the "headlights" are on, which is always when you workout. I'm ordering another one today.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but provides no support
customer_reviews.text: This bra is comfortable and fits well, but it provides as much support as a cotton leisure bra. I purchased this for jogging and am returning it because it provides less support than my non-sports bras.
customer_reviews.author: IIJuan12

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as expected wish it did!
customer_reviews.text: Although it’s the fit I want and I can see it would have been comfortable but it runs too small. I ordered the same size from other companies and it fits. This one does not fit as expected. My advice is to go up one or two cup sizes for women with large breast.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA J.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me at all, I sent it back. I'm a 34D, and I found that this provided medium support at best. I would have had to wear another medium-support bra on top of it to make it work. If you're looking for something better, my favorites so far are the Moving Comfort Juno, and Shock Absorber Women's Run (although the second is nearly impossible to get on by yourself).
customer_reviews.author: emma24

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit with control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 36 DD & it feels like a 34 DD, a much tighter fit than I would like, however it holds me completely in place through my workouts. The Cup size is a perfect fit. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina B.

customer_reviews.title: not full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I'm in between 32 and 34 and I ordered a 34 because reviews said it ran a little small and the band fit great! however the cups were too small. either that or they're not meant to be full coverage. I decided to returned it. maybe i'll try a bigger cup size, but i hate dealing with returns. still searching...
customer_reviews.author: ezaire75

customer_reviews.title: Finally truly covered
customer_reviews.text: Finally fully covered with 36HH UK size which is a 36L, according to the label. Very comfortable and no bounce.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parks, Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: sizing all wrong
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 30 G and despite the label on the item saying 30, when stretched completely the band only measured 27 inches. Returning this and going with panache brand instead. Their bras are accurately sized.
customer_reviews.author: Litlbird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am a 42d this is a perfect fit low to no bounce wouldn't run without it
customer_reviews.author: makes you think fun

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: It says it all it is a shock absorber. I have several similar bras but this is my favorite. It is so comfortable I really dont notice i have it on and thats amazing for a 36DD jogger
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: great work out bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a large breasted woman who loves to work out. I do the insanity work out daily and find that this product gives me the support I need to workout with out pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: rita greiner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing double sports bras in high school, and have always had a hard time finding a sports bra that was supportive enough. I have a small band size and large cup size, which is VERY hard to find any bra to fit, sports bras included. I LOVE that there are clasps in 2 places on your back. The bra does a great job of keeping the bouncing to a minimum without feeling like you are compressed and can't breath. It also covers you enough without feeling like you're wearing a whole tank top. I've used it for long distance running, biking, yoga, etc. and it works for all occasions. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PickyMom09

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to chafing, and hello to support!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Champion sports bras for a decade (the wrong size because they don't make them over DDD) and have been happy with them. It wasn't until I started running longer distances (+6 miles) that I had shockingly bad chafing around the waistband. After reading an article in Runners World, I decided to try out this bra because they had sizes all the way to H(?)! I have not been disappointed and will be purchasing more. No chafing with this bra and a great fit with an support to boot.
customer_reviews.author: MissJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger busts
customer_reviews.text: This bra fits well and is comfortable, but it did not hold my DDs in place. There was still too much bounce and after a 30 minute run I could feel the strain.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Works well for full busted runner
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time finding bras for running in. I am only 5'0" and have a 32/4 D/DD chest (really depends on maker). This bra is tight, but in a good way. Based on others recommendations I ordered 34DD and I could still use a little more room for the girls, but when I ran in it, it definitely did the job and I forgot I was even trying a new bra- which is testament to comfort and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sports bra in hopes of finding a less expensive option for the Lululemon Tata Tamer. This works just as well and at a great price. I just wish that it didn't say "Shock Absorber" across my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Galante

customer_reviews.title: compression bra
customer_reviews.text: too tight. This bra is a compression bra. I ordered normal size and way too tight and uncomfortable. will return
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Versmessen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely unremarkable for high impact activity
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps for young women, this works better than others, but for advancing aged, large-breasted women who do high impact exercise, this bra definitely does not inhibit bounce. I have tried many brands and find that when I am playing tennis or working out, there is nothing out there except a harness that keeps me from bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great sports bra
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bra for women with bigger breasts, especially if you have a smaller ribcage like I do (30GG). It's supportive and doesn't dig in anywhere, plus you can adjust it in two places.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 30 G and always have a hard time finding the right fit. I read good reviews about this item and decided to just chance it. I am so happy that I did. It has great support and the double band is not hard to close by yourself with just a little practice. It also handles the wash just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Yelli

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BRA
customer_reviews.text: Finally a bra that fits true to size!!!! Good support and great quality. Two sets of double clasps in the back too!!
customer_reviews.author: KarenL

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra is comfortable, even for long wear. The support with my large chest size is excellent. The only thing I don't like is that I don't get as much separation as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support but might want to go up one cup size. Would definitely consider buying another one. Stays in place, no tugging.
customer_reviews.author: pallen

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't even clasp the back
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this on. I have been professionally fitted for a bra so I know my size. And this bra was way too small. I could get the band fastened, but trying to wedge my breasts in there? Never happened.
customer_reviews.author: RocketKitty

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is way too tight. Not equal to bra size at all. I will look into returning it to seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Weller

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have to return because the fit is small and strange. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Butler

customer_reviews.title: mediocre compression
customer_reviews.text: This item is a pretty good sports bra, but is not very effective as a binder/for the purpose of compressing one's breasts to pass as male.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Runs extremely small and the hole between clasps makes it very difficult to hook and close. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MASSmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I am hard to fit and this was great! Wearing it right now.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Two small
customer_reviews.text: the bra may have been marked 30F. It was supposed to be a 40F. Anyway it needed to be much larger
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Tullier

product_meta.title: Shock Absorber Women's Multi Sport Max Support Sports Bra Top
product_meta.description: Popular crop top design with internal cup-sized support. Shaped, padded & adjustable straps for extra support. Moisture-wicking, breathable, high performance fabrics.
feature_bullets: B to E Cup: 54% Polyamide, 39% Polyester, 7% Elastane; F to G Cup: 51% Polyamide, 43% Polyester, 6% Elastane
